Scores
=======================================================================

Pick Forecast Category {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
#THIS FILE PATH NEEDS TO BE CHANGED - currently set to my local files
 files2 <-  list.files("/efi_neon_challenge/scores", recursive = TRUE, full.names = TRUE, pattern = "[.]csv")

get_scores <- function(files){
   teams_tmp <- (str_split(basename(files2), c("-")))
 score <- NULL
 for(i in 1:length(teams_tmp)){
   curr_score <- readr::read_csv(files2[i], col_types = list(id = readr::col_character(), score = readr::col_double()))
   if(nrow(curr_score) > 0){
     id <- str_split(curr_score$id, c("_"), simplify = TRUE)
     dates <- sort(lubridate::as_date(unique(id[,1])))
     time_step <- dates[2] - dates[1]
     first_date <- dates[1] - time_step
     combined <- tibble(date = lubridate::as_date(id[, 1]),
                        siteID = id[, 2],
                        target = id[, 3],
                        horizon = as.numeric(lubridate::as_date(id[, 1]) - first_date),
                        theme = teams_tmp[[i]][2],
                        team = tools::file_path_sans_ext(tools::file_path_sans_ext(last(teams_tmp[[i]]))),
                        score = curr_score$score,
                        forecast_start = first_date)
     score <- rbind(score, combined)
   }
 }
 return(score)
}

 
score <- get_scores(files2)

renderUI({
selectInput("theme", "Forecast theme:", 
            choices = unique(score$theme), selected = unique(score$theme)[1])
      })

scores_theme <- reactive({score %>% filter(theme == input$theme)})

vars.score <- reactive({unique(scores_theme()$target)})

renderUI({
  
  selectInput('target.var', "Select Target Variable:", 
              choices = vars.score(), selected = vars.score()[1])
  
})

scores_theme_target <- reactive({scores_theme() %>% filter(target == input$target.var)})

vars.horizon <- reactive({unique(scores_theme_target()$horizon)})

renderUI({
  
  selectInput('summary.var', "Summarize score by:", 
              choices = c("no summary",  "horizon","siteID", "forecast start date","all"), selected = "no summary")
  
})


scores_theme_target_horizon <- reactive({
  
  if(input$summary.var == "no summary"){
    scores_theme_target() %>% 
      select(theme, target, siteID, date, forecast_start, horizon, team, score) %>% 
      mutate(score = round(score, 3))
  }else if(input$summary.var == "horizon"){
    scores_theme_target() %>% 
      select(-date) %>% 
      group_by(siteID, target, theme, team, forecast_start) %>% 
      summarize(score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
      mutate(horizon = "all") %>% 
      mutate(score = round(score, 3)) %>% 
      select(theme, target, siteID, forecast_start, horizon, team, score)
  }else if(input$summary.var == "siteID"){
      scores_theme_target() %>% 
      select(-date) %>% 
      group_by(target, horizon, theme, team, forecast_start) %>% 
      summarize(score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
      mutate(siteID = "all") %>% 
      mutate(score = round(score, 3)) %>% 
      select(theme, target, siteID, forecast_start, horizon, team, score)
  }else if(input$summary.var == "forecast start date"){
          scores_theme_target() %>% 
      select(-date) %>% 
      group_by(target, horizon, theme, team, siteID) %>% 
      summarize(score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
      mutate(forecast_start = "all") %>% 
      mutate(score = round(score, 3)) %>% 
      select(theme, target, siteID, forecast_start, horizon, team, score)
  }else if(input$summary.var == "all"){
          scores_theme_target() %>% 
      select(-date) %>% 
      group_by(target, theme, team) %>% 
      summarize(score = mean(score, na.rm = TRUE)) %>% 
      mutate(forecast_start = "all",
             siteID = "all",
             horizon = "all") %>% 
      mutate(score = round(score, 3)) %>% 
      select(theme, target, siteID, forecast_start, horizon, team, score)
  }
})
```
